A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very bad movie. Waste of Mark Hamil's talent. I strongly disliked The Force Awakens as well. Not a fan of the prequels. The only Star Wars movie made after the original trilogy that I enjoyed was Rogue One. The Return of the Jedi should have been the last Star Wars movie ever made. There can be no Star Wars movie with out Darth Vader.
